column1: The Purple Pig////Okay this is real. I love this place
column2: and it makes me melt inside. You know you're an adult when you eat here. The staff makes me want to work here. They joke
column5: and hustle all at the same time. They introduce you to new wine
column7: and food you know old enough to try now. My family had a garden
column9: and I would never eat them. Purple Pig
column12: and cheese dish that has me going in circles every time I eat it. The lamb they serve falls off the bone
column13: and makes me want to eat all night. Liked the old location more but with pandemic haven't been there much.
